title: Bevy Editor
description: A comprehensive, extensible, and visual game editor for the Bevy game engine. Provides real-time scene editing, entity-component management, asset Browse, and a plugin-based architecture for custom tooling, all built on Bevy's data-driven ECS principles.

title: Taskdown
description: A React TypeScript application with a visual Kanban board interface and parser that converts Jira-style Markdown to structured board data and back. Perfect for managing development tasks with seamless integration between human-readable documentation and programmatic task management.

title: FastIO
description: FastIO is an optimized Java I/O library specifically designed for competitive programming contests like USACO. It provides lightning-fast input/output operations with a simple, clean API that allows you to focus on solving problems rather than dealing with slow I/O.

title: Human Typer
description: A sophisticated Python application that simulates realistic human typing behavior with natural mistakes, speed fluctuations, and corrections.

title: Vellum
description: Vellum is a command-line interface (CLI) for orchestrating collectives of AI agents.

title: Nivaro
description: A centralized platform for managing and growing clubs. Designed as an all-in-one solution, it offers robust tools for membership management, event scheduling with RSVPs, and budget tracking.

title: Tensor-Frame
description: A high-performance, PyTorch-like tensor library for Rust with support for multiple computational backends.
